q: the ascendant tea-party faction views compromise as akin to a white flag of surrender. As Mike Pence , a high-profile House Republican who already sees himself as presidential timber, told a conservative talk show host the other day, There will be no compromise... and if I haven't been clear enough yet, let me say it again: No compromise. his encounter and explained that he met Mrs. Michelle Obama on the set of LIVE With Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa , on which they both appeared yesterday. Here's how David Letterman recounted his very first meeting with Michelle Obama . She was on the show, but I didn't think I would see her because the Secret Service doesn't want my kind messing around with her kind, David Letterman joked. However, the officials told David Letterman to wait for the first lady off stage and that she would speak to him after her interview with Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa .
